content: 2018 Bitcoin Penny graded set - silver, JULIE, SNSTARTING BID: 0.0000BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: 24 Hours from time of post**Payment due at auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC.
